entry.title: Multisign payment protocol?
entry.summary: In an email exchange between Drak and Jeff Garzik on March 11, 2014, Drak expressed his admiration for the idea of assuming that each party involved in a transaction uses HD wallets. Garzik responded by pointing out that this idea assumes a reality different from our current one. Garzik is a Bitcoin core developer and open source evangelist who works at BitPay, Inc.
